de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.data

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.data.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The data manager provides an interface to the state of the scenario data objects and attributes. It is responsible for proper locking of data object and for logging changes in the state of the data.

      • DataManager

        public DataManager(ScenarioInstance instance)

    • Method Detail

      • changeDataObjectState

        public java.lang.Boolean changeDataObjectState(int dataObjectId,
                                               int stateId,
                                               int activityInstanceId)
        Changes the state of a data object instance if there exists one matching the passed id. Logs the appropriate change to the database.
        Parameters:
        dataObjectId - Id of the dataobject, to which the instance belongs
        stateId - Id of the new state
        activityInstanceId - id of the activity instance which changed the dataobject
        Returns:
        Returns if the state was successfully changed

      • getAvailableInput

        public java.util.List<DataObject> getAvailableInput(int activityId)
        Searches for data objects which fulfill one of the conditions of the input set.
        Parameters:
        activityId - Id of the activity
        Returns:
        List of data objects

      • loadFromDatabase

        public void loadFromDatabase()
        This method load all dataobjects for the scenario instance, with which the DataManager was created. If the scenario instance is newly created, nothing happens since there are no data object entries in the database.

      • getDataObjectForId

        public java.util.Optional<DataObject> getDataObjectForId(int dataObjectId)

      • getDataAttributeInstances

        public java.util.List<DataAttributeInstance> getDataAttributeInstances()

      • getDataObjects

        public java.util.List<DataObject> getDataObjects()

      • lockDataobject

        public java.lang.Boolean lockDataobject(int dataObjectId)
        Sets the data object to on change. Write this into the database.
        Parameters:
        dataObjectId - This is the database id from the data object.
        Returns:
        true if the on change could been set. false if not.

      • checkInputSet

        public boolean checkInputSet(java.lang.Integer inputSetId)

      • initializeDataObject

        public void initializeDataObject(int dataClassId,
                                 int stateId)

      • translate

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> translate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dataClassNameToStateName)
        Translates the Map of dataclass name and state name to a map of dataclass id and state id for easier database access and use
        Parameters:
        dataClassNameToStateName - map containing names
        Returns:
        map containing ids

      • setAttributeValues

        public boolean setAttributeValues(int activityInstanceId,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> idToValue)
        Sets the values of data attributes and logs the attribute change. Checks whether the values are of valid type for the attribute.
        Parameters:
        activityInstanceId - needed for the log entry
        idToValue - map of attribute instance id to new value
        Returns:
        true if all attributes could be set correctly, false if an attribute was of the wrong data type

      • setDataObjects

        public void setDataObjects(java.util.List<DataObject> dataObjects)
